name: Duality of DAD
description:
Duality of DAD

Dad's gotta fix the bathroom... if only he knew where his wrench was...

Oh no, water is getting everywhere! Just another job Dad has got to do, and like usual, stuff is not where it's supposed to be!

Help Dad navigate his house and avoid water and ice to fix the bathroom in this 2D side scroller platformer.

Use the arrows to move and jump, E to enter doors and stairs, Esc for the map and mouse for menu buttons.

Made using Unity Playground and Toon Boom Harmony Premium and Adobe Photoshop.

Created by

  • Ruby Meades - Ideas, character design, game design, level map, animation, game developer, UI
  • Chris Popham - Ideas, asset design, clean up, background art

Thanks to SIT for the facilities.
